(16 November 2015)

| Player wins        = Park Sung-hee (30–14)
| Singles wins       = Park Sung-hee (24–12)

The South Korea Fed Cup team represents South Korea (officially the Republic of Korea) in Fed Cup tennis competition and are governed by the Korea Tennis Association.  They currently compete in the Asia/Oceania Zone of Group I.
History
South Korea competed in its first Fed Cup in 1973.  Their best result was qualifying for World Group II in 1997, and reaching the round of 16 on five occasions.
Current team (2017)
* Jang Su-jeong
* Han Na-lae
* Kim Na-ri
* Choi Ji-hee
